<L>12556<pc>768-2<k1>yama<k2>yama
{@Yama@},¦ dual ({%°au%}) (“the twins”) = Nakula and Sahadeva: I,
124, 2445 (born from the Aśvins), 3818, 4850 (born from the
Aśvins), 4851, 5820, 5839, 5872, †7014, †7016, †7058, †7139,
†7158, 7227, 7235, 7505, 7547, 7994; II, 38, 41, 557, 990,
1221, 1670, 1921, †2118, 2370, 2388, †2399, 2411, 2448;
III, 275, 551, 894, †903, †918, †943, 1246, †1965, 1993,
8477, 10417, †10839, 10871, 10881 ({%°yoḥ pūrvajaḥ%}, i.e.
Arjuna), 11008, 11403, 11410, 11629, 11819, †12321, 12432,
†12578, 13007, †14745, †14753, †14754, 14941, 15008,
†15694, 15766, 17289, 17300; IV, 649, 1087, 1311, †2304;
V, 57, 199, 619, 1959, 2215, 2916, 3177, 3200, 3403, 4887,
4949, 5232, 5642, 7598; VI, 1994, 3067, 3681, †3767,
4243, 4792, 4945, 5553; VII, †68, †81, 227, 578, 1743,
2950, 3050, †6726, 6899, 7013, 7732, 7754, 8544, 8552,
8644, 8645, 8690, 9007, 9133; VIII, 845, 1231, 1690
({%Mādrīputrau%}), 1694, 1701, †1728, 2254, 2334, 2702, 2708,
3180, 3319, †3485, 3573, 3796, 4512, †4805; IX, 253, 566,
762, 1831; XII, 26, 51, 1175, 1695, 1914, 1921, 1929;
XIV, 384, 1845, 1874 ({%Mādrīputrau%}), 2555, 2612; XV, 35,
333, 658, †663, 747, 1004; XVI, 284; XVII, 5, 20, 31
(only C.); XVIII, 36, 96, 118. Cf. Yamaja, dual.
<LEND>
